content: this fun fishy pattern was inspired by mc escher s designs the hat has a light and plush texture and a bit of a slouch on top yarn requirements are 150 meters / 164 yards fingering weight yarn for color 1 130 meters / 142 yards fingering weight yarn for color 2 any fingering weight yarn will do i would like to play around with color variation in the color 2 section of the pattern you could make a tropical fish aquarium this is my first pattern and i would appreciate any feedback thanks for giving it a try
